thread.title: VIDEO: Arsenal starlet Chuba Akpom shows off his skills
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Arsenal starlet Chuba Akpom shows off his skills

title: VIDEO: Arsenal starlet Chuba Akpom shows off his skills
text:
0 31 Jan 2017 12:10:27 Seagulls fans will hope for some magic from the fast-footed Gunners forward, who has signed a deal with the club until the end of the season 
Fans of Premier League hopefuls Brighton and Hove Albion are in for a treat after the club signed Arsenal youngster Chuba Akpom on loan. 
The 21-year-old forward joined Chris Hughton's side until the end of the season on Monday and he will hope to play a part as the Seagulls plot promotion to the top flight. 
Last summer Akpom featured in a skill session with FFDTV and Brighton fans can get a sense of the attacker's impressive technique in the video below ahead of his potential debut on Thursday against Huddersfield Town. 
The England Under-21 international showcases some amazing close control and cool dribbling prowess before nestling a shot into the top corner. 
Akpom, who spent last season on loan at Hull City, previously enjoyed spells on loan at Brentford, Coventry City and Nottingham Forest. Related
